msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at left and right. Kolleseis in the left and right margins. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. Unusually wide left margin (7.2 cm.) and narrow right margin (1.2 cm.). (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

div.ab: "(Column) 28:;(Phamenoth) 12:;Satabous, son of Petheus., grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchopis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Pasion, son of Petsiris, grandson of Pasion, mother Thases, drachmas 4;;Patkonnis, son of Mysthes, grandson of Patkonnis, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsais, obols 28;;Petalion, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petalion, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Onnophris, grandson of Horos, mother Herais, drachmas 4;;Didymion, son of Petheus the elder, grandson of Didymion, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Dionysios, fatherless, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Phasis, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas, guard taxes, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 44, obols 28;;(Phamenoth)13 likewise:;Perigenes, son of Zoilos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Herieus, son of Sambas, grandson of Peteesis, mother Tapapeis, drachmas 24;;in total for the day drachmas 28;;(Phamenoth) 13 likewise:;Pakysis, son of Katalytes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis, drachmas 12;;Phanomgeus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Horos, son of Menander, grandson of Anchophis, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Nestosiris, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Horos, son of Anchophis, grandson of Herakles, mother Teseuris, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, drachmas 4;;Pasion, son of Petheus, grandson of Sambathion, mother Tathautis, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris, drachmas 4;;Chairemon, his son, mother Tbelles, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Esouris, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Petaus, son of Esouris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollauthis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 60;;(Phamenoth) 15 likewise:;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Polis, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Herais, drachmas 4;;Petalos, son of Petaus, grandson of Petaus, mother Soeris, drachmas 8;;Harsiesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Harsiesis, mother Thatres, drachmas 8;;Polydeukes, son of Heras, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapasion, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;Lucius Longinus Gemellus,;a third of the bath tax for the 13th year, alloy drachmas 28;;in total for the day drachmas 64, obols 28;;(Phamenoth) 16 likewise:;Maron, son of Satabous, grandson of Maron, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 4;;Menches, brother with the same mother, drachmas 4;;Phaesis, son of Pekmeis alias Heuremon, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4."
